mapper.select: SELECT u.user_cd AS userCd, u.user_nm AS userNm, '가스' AS energyType, g.type AS usageType, SUM(us.gas_usage) AS usageAmount, g.charge AS unitCharge, SUM(us.gas_usage * g.charge) AS totalCharge FROM t_user u JOIN t_usage us ON u.user_cd = us.user_cd JOIN t_gas g ON us.gas_cd = g.gas_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y' AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND YEAR(gas_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(gas_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) GROUP BY u.user_cd, u.user_nm, g.type, g.charge

SELECT u.user_cd AS userCd, u.user_nm AS userNm, '전기' AS energyType, e.type AS usageType, SUM(us.elec_usage) AS usageAmount, e.charge AS unitCharge, SUM(us.elec_usage * e.charge) AS totalCharge FROM t_user u JOIN t_usage us ON u.user_cd = us.user_cd JOIN t_elec e ON us.elec_cd = e.elec_cd WHERE u.use_yn = 'Y'AND u.user_cd=(select user_cd from t_user where user_id = #{user_id}) AND YEAR(elec_time) = YEAR(CURDATE()) AND MONTH(elec_time) = MONTH(CURDATE()) GROUP BY u.user_cd, u.user_nm, e.type, e.charge
